original_title: 肛虐懺悔 こじ開けられた秘穴
overview: Dengo’s Mom passed away tragically, and he barely can contain his grief. His sadness becomes fury turning him into a dangerous man.  He then grabs a gun and focuses his anger at the doctors and nurses who cared for his Mother: Oshima and Hirose Riona.  He rounds them up at gunpoint in a room and lets the deranged insanity begin.
title: Anal Confession Pryed Open Secret Hole Hirose Riona
